snippet.title: Dance of Cards – Steam Trailer
snippet.description:
Dance of Cards is a tactical gambling role-playing game where you play poker to survive.
Bribe your opponents, bluff and get aces out of your pocket to win in this unruled battle of cheats and tricks!
Wishlist on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1797630/Dance_of_Cards/?utm_source=youtube
Follow on Twitter:
https://twitter.com/FrogOfHearts
